value:
Sometimes, I lose my temper... One
time, I even pointed my sword at a
superior officer.$k$pMy brother would have been quite
disappointed, had he heard about it.

Lady Ishtar trusts my brother
implicitly. That hasn't made Lord
Julius very fond of him, however.

I've taken my magical studies in a
new direction.$k$pI may yet be inexperienced, but that's
liberating. I don't worry about
consequences—I just get on with it.

My brother is proud, but he is also
very kind. I expect he would sacrifice
himself if it meant saving me...

Someday, I'd like to have a child...
Er, no... It's not like I have a father in
mind!

Pardon the intrusion. I'm Olwen, and
I'm delivering this greeting in place of
$Nf.

I'm doing well, aren't I? That
is very satisfying.

I'll continue to walk my own path,
one step at a time.
I am sorry that I have failed you.

This new power you've given
me... I will not squander it.

My name is Olwen. If you'll allow it, I'd
be happy to demonstrate the magic
I've been studying recently.

I turned my back on my country. From
then on, I swore to walk my own path,
no matter the consequences.$k$pEven if I were to be killed because of
my decision...so be it. That is the way
things must be.$k$pThough we've rarely spoken, I have
observed the conviction in your eyes.$k$pThat conviction is so strong it feels as
though it might consume me...$k$pIt seems your belief in the path you
are traveling is unshakable. I hope to
find that kind of confidence in myself.$k$pI am proud to walk alongside you. I
hope you will allow me to continue to
accompany you on your journey.
はぁっ！
参ります！
きゃああっ！
Not yet...!
I walk my own path!
With this newfound power...
Absolutely not!
Forward, now!
The fight will continue...
cute giggle
I am Olwen. With my newfound power, I will do what I can to aid you.
Eh? What? Stop with your teasing.
My one goal was to match the greatness of my elder brother. But then...
No matter how grim the journey gets, I shall continue on my path.
I can keep moving forward thanks to you.
I hope that, one day, I'll be able to come to my brother's aid.
I would continue to protect you, if you'll allow it.
I understand.
Undoubtedly.
By your side.
